title: Why Platform Engineers Are Embracing WebAssembly for Serverless
author: Matt Butcher
description: From AWS Lambda to SpinKube, WebAssembly introduces an evolution in serverless with unmatched startup speeds and infrastructure flexibility.
cntitle: 平台工程师为何拥抱用于无服务器的 WebAssembly
cndescription: 从 AWS Lambda 到 SpinKube，WebAssembly 引入了服务器端无服务器计算的演变，具有无与伦比的启动速度和基础设施灵活性。
